message: Hi Bob, I have a top-quality product available and I'm offering it to you at $8000. Let me know if you're ready to move forward!

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate the product quality, $8000 is a bit steep for my budget. I would be willing to pay $6500 for the product. This is a fair offer considering market conditions.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand where you're coming from, but given the quality of the product and current market conditions, I can only part with the product at a minimum of $8000. Let me know if you can meet that price.
